name: Green Ocean Real Estate Service. Anacortes, WA Property Management

reviews.author: Sheila Hosner
reviews.review: I have been very happy  with Alan Workman and the bookkeeping team at John L. Scott.  I feel I have been in good hands.

ownerResponse.text: Hi Sheila, Thank you so much for sharing your experience working with Allen and the team!

reviews.author: Jackson Chen
reviews.review: Very satisfied with the customer service. They were very professional and timely. 10/10 highly recommended.

ownerResponse.text: Thank you very much for the review Jackson!
